resp = client.search(
    query={
        "match": {
            "city": "madrid"
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "tags": {
            "significant_terms": {
                "field": "tag",
                "background_filter": {
                    "term": {
                        "text": "spain"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
